body_en: In the same context, [the blockade of the Azovstal steel plant](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Siege_of_Mariupol#Resistance_in_the_Azovstal_steel_plant) is presented. The topic peaked at the end of May, when the Ukrainian side decided not to continue trying to defend Azovstal. Russian propaganda covered this event as a "nationalist surrender".
